description:
'''Bear McCreary''' (born February 17, 1979) is an American composer of film, television, and video game scores. His work includes the scores of the television series ''[[Battlestar Galactica (2004 TV series)|Battlestar Galactica]]'' (2004), ''[[Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.]]'', ''[[Black Sails (TV series)|Black Sails]]'', ''[[Outlander (TV series)|Outlander]]'', ''[[The Walking Dead (TV series)|The Walking Dead]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', ''[[The Serpent Queen]]'', ''[[Percy Jackson and the Olympians (TV series)|Percy Jackson and the Olympians]]'', ''[[Halo (TV series)|Halo]]'', the video games ''[[Call of Duty: Vanguard]]'', ''[[God of War (2018 video game)|God of War]]'' and ''[[God of War Ragnarök]]'', and the film ''[[Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019 film)|Godzilla: King of the Monsters]]''.

McCreary has been nominated for an [[Emmy Award|Emmy]] for Outstanding Music Composition for a Series for his work on season one of ''Outlander'' and won one Emmy for the main title of ''[[Da Vinci's Demons]]''. He is also a two-time winner of both the [[British Academy Games Award for Music]] and [[D.I.C.E. Award for Outstanding Achievement in Original Music Composition]] for his work on ''God of War'' and ''Ragnarök''.
